biotools.summary: Software package for efficiently mapping DNA snippets (reads) against a reference DNA sequence. It can map short and long reads, and supports Hamming distance (only substitutions) and edit distance (substitutions/insertions/deletions). It accepts both single-end and paired-end reads for alignment, and can run on multiple CPU cores using multithreading.

bioschemas.name: Hobbes
